title: A Close Shaving
description: A classic silent hologram from actor and comedian, Harold Zoid.
altHero: anthropomorphic lobster (Harold Zoid) in old-timey hat and glasses sharpens a razor in a barber shop
alt1: Harold Zoid snips a man’s mustache ends off with his claws
alt2: the man, who is now mustache-less, screams and points at Zoid
alt3: Zoid applies shaving cream to the man’s chin
alt4: Zoid snips the man’s head off with his claws
